name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou WPK - Shokutokudoumei Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Relive the historical drama unfold towards unification in the footsteps of Nobunaga Oda and Ieyasu Tokugawa, the sworn allies from childhood.
